app.title: Easy to GIF
app.description: Free online video to GIF converter, supports multiple formats, fast conversion, completely free
app.keywords: video to gif,online converter,free tool,video processing,FFmpeg

hero.title: Easy to GIF
hero.subtitle: Free online video to GIF converter, supports multiple formats, fast conversion, completely free

privacy.title: Privacy Protection
privacy.description: All processing is done locally in your browser, we don't save any files

fast.title: Fast Conversion
fast.description: Based on FFmpeg WASM technology, fast conversion speed

initialization.title: Initializing conversion engine
initialization.description: First use requires downloading FFmpeg core files (about 30MB), please wait...
initialization.successDescription: You can now upload video files to start conversion

upload.title: Select video file
upload.dragText: Drag video file here, or click to select file
upload.supportedFormats: Supports MP4, MOV, AVI, WebM and other formats, max 200MB
upload.formatError: Unsupported video format, please select MP4, MOV, AVI, WebM and other formats
upload.readError: Unable to read video file, please select a valid video file

conversion.title: Conversion settings
conversion.heightAuto: Height will be automatically adjusted proportionally
conversion.successDescription: GIF has been generated, you can preview and download
conversion.failedDescription: Please check video file or retry

tips.title: Usage tips
items: Click GIF thumbnail or preview button to view large image
Right-click GIF to save to local
If GIF is too large, you can adjust conversion parameters to regenerate

progress.downloadDescription: First use requires downloading FFmpeg core files (about 30MB), please be patient...
progress.conversionCompleted: Conversion complete! You can now preview and download GIF
progress.initCompletedDescription: Initialization complete! You can now upload video files to start conversion
progress.conversionError: Error occurred during conversion, please check video file or retry
progress.initError: Error occurred during initialization, please refresh page to retry

privacy.title: Privacy Protection
privacy.description: All processing is done locally, no files are uploaded
